thread.title: Smart place to stay in the 7th
thread.title_full: Smart place to stay in the 7th - Review of Saint Dominique Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jester246
title: Smart place to stay in the 7th
text: Stayed at Hotel Saint Dominique just for a single night between the countryside and flying out of Paris. Having stayed at quite a few places in the area, we were very happy with this choice. Terrific location, high standard property, good sized rooms, excellent staff. We had a room with windows which opened right up onto Rue Saint Dominique which was lovely in the mild afternoon weather. Will definitely stay here again.
